reviewText: I first saw Remi when I was growing up 24 years ago and since then I have remembered just about every episode. It teaches many values to kids and life lessons that do come in handy. I know for I have used a couple of them since. It's worth more than what is sold for.

This cartoon is based on classic french litterature books "Sans Famille" and "Sans Famille 2", by renown author Hector Malot. It the story of a young orphan, Remi, who is sold to a traveling musician. Excellent!
